Description: Name of burn unit (i.e., Angel, 25 Mile, Sherman Creek, Chumstick ZUI, Paradise 90, Orion 2)
Sampling episode short name (i.e., PRE, POST)
Calendar date of wired log installation (DD-MMM-YY)
Plot number (i.e., 1-20) of nearest overstory permanent plot
Individual transect number (i.e., 1-3) at each plot.
Four letter species code (i.e., PSME = Pseudotsuga menziesii, PIPO = Pinus ponderosa).
Scientific name (i.e., "Pinus ponderosa", "Pseudotsuga menziesii", Laryx occidentalis") of sample tree.
Diameter of 1000-hr log where it crosses the woody line transect, measured to the 0.1 inch.
Decay class (i.e., 1-5) of individual 1000-hr log. "1" equals most sound, "5" equals most rotten. See methods for full description of decay classes.
